*** Experiemnt setup  ***
*** S(x,v) = 1/sqrt(2*pi)*v^2*e^{-v^2/2}*(1+cos(2*pi*(x+1/2))) ***
*** R(x) = 1/eps^2 (ax+b), with a=-1000.0, b=1100.0 and eps = 1.0  ***
*** Quantity of interest is F(X) = X  ***
*** OBS!! replace this text with specification of boundary conditions  ***

Convergence tests, kurtosis, telescoping sum check
